code: import React from"react";import"./Charity.css";import usdtIcon from'./assets/icons/usdt.png';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Charity=_ref=>{let{id,title,banner,description,charity_target,charity_status,top_contributors,members,charity_title}=_ref;const BASE_URL="http://admin.tducoin.com/public/storage/";const picUrl="".concat(BASE_URL).concat(banner);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"charity",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"charitypic-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:picUrl,alt:"charity Pic",className:"charity-pic"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"charity-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"status-line",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"status-background"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"status-progress",style:{width:"".concat(charity_status/charity_target*100,"%")}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"charity-status-text",style:{left:"".concat(charity_status/charity_target*100,"%"),top:'-25px'},children:charity_status})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"quiz-footer-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"quiz-footer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"total",children:charity_title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"value-icon",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:usdtIcon,alt:"USDT Icon",className:"usdt-icon"}),charity_target," USDT"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"players",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"avatar-container",children:top_contributors&&top_contributors.slice(0,4).map((member,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"avatar",style:{backgroundImage:"url(".concat(BASE_URL).concat(member.avatar,")")}},index))}),"+ ",members]})]})]})]});};export default Charity;
